Module com.deanwhitten.inventorymanagementsystem
Package com.deanwhitten.inventorymanagementsystem

Class Main_Controller

java.lang.Object
com.deanwhitten.inventorymanagementsystem.Main_Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Main_Controller extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The Main screen controller. This is the initial screen launched when starting the program. This screen has two tables, one for parts and one for products. The tables can both be searched for parts and products in addition to allowing adding, modifying, and deleting of parts and products.
Author:
Dean F Whitten

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the Main Screen controller. Populates the parts and product tables with inventory of parts and products.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location -
      resources -

    • onPartsSearchBarInput

      private void onPartsSearchBarInput(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Searches for parts by Part ID or by Part Name. a UI error is called and displayed if no results are found.
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - typing text in the Part search field.

    • onAddPartButtonClick

      private void onAddPartButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Opens window to add Part.
      Parameters:
      event - add button is clicked for Parts table
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onModifyPartButtonClick

      private void onModifyPartButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Opens modify part for a selected part. The UI is cleared. The selected part is assigned to selectedPart. If a part is not selected an error will be displayed in the UI, otherwise the part modification window opens.
      Parameters:
      event - modify button is clicked for parts table
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onDeletePartButtonClick

      private void onDeletePartButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Deletes a selected part. The UI is cleared. The selected part is assigned to selectedPart. If a part is not selected an error will be displayed in the UI, otherwise the deletion conformation UI elements will be shown and enabled.
      Parameters:
      event - delete button is clicked for parts table

    • partsYES_clicked

      private void partsYES_clicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Yes is selected in part deletion confirmation. Resets UI, part IS deleted from the inventory, table is updated, and then checks to see if the deletion occurred. IF delete fails, an error is displayed in the UI.
      Parameters:
      event - yes button is clicked for deletion conformation for a selected part

    • partsNO_clicked

      private void partsNO_clicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      No is selected in part deletion confirmation. Resets UI and part is NOT deleted from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      event - no button is clicked for deletion conformation for a selected part

    • onProductsSearchBarInput

      private void onProductsSearchBarInput(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Searches for products by product ID or by product Name. a UI error is called and displayed if no results are found.
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - typing text in the product search field.

    • onAddProductButtonClick

      private void onAddProductButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Opens window to add product.
      Parameters:
      event - add button is clicked for products table
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onModifyProductButtonClick

      private void onModifyProductButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Opens modify product for a selected product. The UI is cleared. The selected product is assigned to selectedProduct. If a product is not selected an error will be displayed in the UI, otherwise the product modification window opens.
      Parameters:
      event - modify button is clicked for products table
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onDeleteProductButtonClick

      private void onDeleteProductButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Deletes a selected product. The UI is cleared. The selected product is assigned to selectedProduct. If a product is not selected an error will be displayed in the UI, otherwise the deletion conformation UI elements will be shown and enabled.
      Parameters:
      event - delete button is clicked for products table

    • productsYES_clicked

      private void productsYES_clicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Yes is selected in Product deletion confirmation. Resets UI, product IS deleted from the inventory, table is updated, and then checks to see if the deletion occurred. IF delete fails, an error is displayed in the UI. Deletion will fail if the product has associated parts.
      Parameters:
      event - product yes button is clicked

    • productsNO_clicked

      private void productsNO_clicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      No is selected in Product deletion confirmation. Resets UI and product is NOT deleted from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      event - no button is clicked for deletion conformation

    • onExitButtonClick

      private void onExitButtonClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Exits the program.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - exist button is clicked

    • uiErrorMsgHandler

      public void uiErrorMsgHandler(Main_Controller.HandledObject HandledObject, Main_Controller.ErrorType errorType)
      UI error msg handler that shows the appropriate error message based on the ErrorType and Handled Object.
      Parameters:
      HandledObject - the handled object
      errorType - the error type

    • getConformationUI

      public void getConformationUI(Main_Controller.HandledObject HandledObject)
      Gets the appropriate UI elements for the confirmation of the deletion for a product or part.
      Parameters:
      HandledObject - the handled object being confirmed for deletion

    • uiRESET

      public void uiRESET()
      Resets the UI for all error labels and conformations buttons back to disabled and invisible

    • loadWindow

      public static void loadWindow(String page, javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Loads Window of another view based on the "page" specified.
      Parameters:
      page - the page or view to be loaded
      event - the event
      Throws:
      IOException - the io exception
